advisory.translation[0].definitions[0].d: having the purpose of giving advice
advisory.translation[0].definitions[0].e: He was employed in a purely advisory role.
advisory.translation[1].definitions[0].d: an official warning or notice that gives information about a dangerous situation
advisory.translation[1].definitions[0].e: The State Department issues travel advisories about conditions overseas.
